snippet: The Regional Greenhouse Gas Initiative, a nine-state collaboration to trim carbon emissions, suggests reducing the limit on emissions as incentive for electric utilities.
abstract: Regional Greenhouse Gas Initiative, nine-state collaboration to trim carbon emissions, proposes fundamental change to increase electrical utilities’ incentive to cut emissions from fossil-fuel plants by raising the cost of compliance.
lead_paragraph: The Regional Greenhouse Gas Initiative, a nine-state collaboration to trim carbon emissions, suggests reducing the limit on emissions as incentive for electric utilities.

headline.main: States’ Group Calls for 45% Cut in Amount of Carbon Emissions Allowed
headline.print_headline: States’ Group Calls for 45% Cut in Amount of Carbon Emissions Allowed
